member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.AzureOpenAISummaryProvider
member.summary: Provides summary and question-answering functionality using Azure OpenAI services.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.AzureOpenAISummaryProvider.#ctor(System.Security.SecureString,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified API key, endpoint, and model.
member.remarks: This constructor initializes the provider and creates an internal chat client for interacting with the Azure OpenAI service. Ensure that the provided API key and endpoint are valid and have the necessary permissions to access the specified model.
member.param: The API key used to authenticate requests to the Azure OpenAI service. Cannot be null or empty.
The endpoint URL of the Azure OpenAI service. Must be a valid URI and cannot be null or empty.
The name of the OpenAI model to use for generating summaries. Cannot be null or empty.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.AzureOpenAISummaryProvider.CreateChatClient
member.summary: Initializes and configures the chat client for interacting with the Azure OpenAI service.
member.remarks: This method creates an instance of the Azure OpenAI chat client using the specified endpoint, API key, and model. The resulting client is assigned to the property.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.BaseSummaryProvider
member.summary: Base class for summary providers using AI chat clients.

member.name: E:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.BaseSummaryProvider.SummaryResourcesCalculated
member.summary: Occurs when summary resources are calculated during summarization.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.BaseSummaryProvider.PromptAddition
member.summary: Gets or sets additional instructions to be appended to the prompt for summarization or question answering.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.BaseSummaryProvider.ChatClient
member.summary: Gets or sets the AI chat client used for summarization and question answering.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.BaseSummaryProvider.Model
member.summary: Gets or sets the model name used by the AI chat client for processing requests.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.BaseSummaryProvider.MaxTokenCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of tokens that can be processed. Default is 128000.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.BaseSummaryProvider.GetSummary(Telerik.Windows.Documents.TextRepresentation.SimpleTextDocument)
member.summary: Generates a summary for the specified document using the AI chat client.
member.returns: A summary string generated by the AI model.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.BaseSummaryProvider.AskQuestion(System.String,Telerik.Windows.Documents.TextRepresentation.SimpleTextDocument)
member.summary: Asks a question about the specified document and returns the AI-generated answer.
member.param: The document to use as context for the question.
member.returns: The answer string generated by the AI model.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.BaseSummaryProvider.CreateChatClient
member.summary: When implemented in a derived class, creates and initializes the AI chat client.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.BaseSummaryProvider.SummarizationProcessor_SummaryResourcesCalculated(System.Object,Telerik.Windows.Documents.AIConnector.SummaryResourcesCalculatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the event when summary resources are calculated, allowing execution to continue. Also raises the SummaryResourcesCalculated event for external subscribers.
member.param: The event data containing summary resource information.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.BaseSummaryProvider.OnSummaryResourcesCalculated(System.Object,Telerik.Windows.Documents.AIConnector.SummaryResourcesCalculatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the SummaryResourcesCalculated event.

member.summary: Returns the actual key.

member.summary: Gets or sets additional instructions to be appended to the prompt for summarization or question answering.

member.summary: Generates a summary for the specified document.
member.returns: A summary string generated by the provider.

member.param: The document to use as context for the question.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.LlamaSummaryProvider
member.summary: Provides summary and question-answering functionality using a Llama server.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.LlamaSummaryProvider.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified endpoint and model.
member.remarks: This constructor initializes the provider and sets up the necessary client for communication with the Llama service. Ensure that the is a valid URL and that the corresponds to a supported model.
member.param: The endpoint URL used to connect to the Llama service.
The name of the model to be used for generating summaries.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.LlamaSummaryProvider.CreateChatClient
member.summary: Initializes and assigns a new instance of the chat client.
member.remarks: This method creates an instance of using the specified endpoint and model. The created client is assigned to the property.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.OpenAISummaryProvider
member.summary: Provides document summarization and question answering using the OpenAI API.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.OpenAISummaryProvider.#ctor(System.Security.SecureString,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified API key and model.
member.remarks: This constructor initializes the OpenAI client and prepares it for use with the specified model. Ensure that the provided API key is valid and has the necessary permissions to access the OpenAI service.
member.param: The API key used to authenticate requests to the OpenAI service. Cannot be null or empty.
The name of the OpenAI model to use for generating summaries. Cannot be null or empty.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.AIProviders.OpenAISummaryProvider.CreateChatClient
member.summary: Initializes and assigns a chat client instance using the specified OpenAI model and API key.
member.remarks: This method creates an instance of the OpenAI chat client and configures it with the provided model. Ensure that the key field is set to a valid OpenAI API key before calling this method.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.RadPdfViewerNavigationPane
member.summary: Represents a navigation pane for the RadPdfViewer, providing a user interface component that allows users to navigate and interact with PDF documents. This class implements the interface to manage content sizing, and the interface to support theming. The class manages the visual representation of bookmarks and tab control elements, allowing dynamic updates based on the associated and its documents. It also provides properties for configuring the navigation pane's width and integrates event handling for changes in document state and user interaction with navigation elements.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.RadPdfViewerAttachedComponents
member.summary: Represents a class that provides attached properties for customizing the . It includes the ability to register various dialog components such as a context menu, find dialog, signature properties dialog, sign-signature dialog, and password required dialog. This class allows users to enhance the functionality of the by attaching these components dynamically, based on Boolean property values.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.FixedDocumentViewersUI.RadRadioMenuGroupItem
member.summary: Represents a radio menu group item in a RadMenu, allowing for single selection from a group of menu items. This class provides a property to keep track of the currently selected item. It manages the association between menu items and their corresponding values, ensuring that only one item can be selected at a time while updating the interface accordingly. The class overrides methods to prepare and clear item containers for correct item selection behavior, and it handles state changes when the selection is altered.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadPdfViewerToolBar
member.summary: Represents a customizable toolbar for the control, providing various PDF viewing and manipulation functionalities such as opening, saving, printing, rotating, navigating pages, zooming, and adding signatures. The toolbar allows developers to show or hide specific buttons and options based on user needs. It utilizes dependency properties to manage the visibility of toolbar elements and provides methods for applying themes and updating visibility dynamically.
